title: The area under construction of Solid Waste Management System /Bio- degradable waste treatment plant shall be free of FSI
clause_text: The area under construction of Solid Waste Management System /Bio- degradable waste treatment plant shall be free of FSI. The Completion Certificate for the Solid Waste Management System /Bio-degradable Waste Treatment Plant issued by Environmental Consultant shall be submitted before asking for Occupation Certificate/Building Completion Certificate.‚Äù
